name: Wizard Academy Week 3 - Nightmares
description:
Stay alive as long as you can in a nightmare world. Move with WASD or arrow keys, mouse rotates and Mouse1 fires your gun. Esc brings up the Pause Menu. Enjoy!

Made with the Unity tutorial for a Survival Shooter game. All assets, etc. belong to them and are used here with permission. I did not enjoy this project and hope to return to it in the future to make it more 'mine'.
